text: Stade René Gaillard is a football stadium in Niort, France and is the home stadium of Chamois Niortais. It has a capacity of 11,352 people and was opened on 3 August 1974. The record attendance at the stadium is 16,715 for the game between Chamois Niortais and Olympique Marseille in 1988. == References == == Other websites == * Niort - official website Category:1974 establishments in France Category:Football stadiums in France Category:Niort
title: Stade René Gaillard
